title: how much does $50 rp get you now?

embed.description: Here's how much RP each card gets you! You can purchase prepaid RP cards from any of the authorized retailers listed below. These cards will be redeemable on the Oceania League of Legends server. 1. Launch the League of Legends client or go to signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com to create an account. 2.

body:
it wont fuarking tell me

edit: it was originally 6800 rp

replies.body: enough to get me arclight vayne
no thank i aint gonna get you that k thx

how much rp do you get from $50 gift card oce and which store can u get them from
{{champion:157}}

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kAUHPEJt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-20T07:23:37.306+0000)
>
> 5900 according to the store

That's so jacked if you think about it, 5 champs for $50.

$10 a champ, gg Riot.

Riot don't expect you to buy champions with RP, its simply an option for people who don't have the patience to grind out 60 games to get 6300 IP. Since on average, 10 games will get you around 1000 IP.

ALSO 5900 doesnt get you 5 champs, it gets you 6. They are 975ea. 6x975 = 5850 (about $8.30 ea). Also if you wait til they are on sale, you can get 12.

Fun Fact: If you were to buy all the champions it would cost nearly $800. (400 if on sale)
Isn't it 7800 or 7200? Or did they change it.
